title: The development of Integrated Industrial Area within the jurisdiction of Maharashtra Industrial Development Corporation shall be allowed as per Urban Development Department‘s Notification No
clause_text: The development of Integrated Industrial Area within the jurisdiction of Maharashtra Industrial Development Corporation shall be allowed as per Urban Development Department‘s Notification No.TPB-4314/20/CR-32/2014/UD-11, dated 1st August, 2015. The Principal Regulation‘s referred in the said notification shall be deemed to have reference to provisions of UDCPR alongwith specific regulations related to MIDC mentioned in Chapter 10.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
